sn52.9:3.1: 9. Ambapālivanasutta
sn52.9:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ āyasmā ca anuruddho āyasmā ca sāriputto vesāliyaṃ viharanti ambapālivane.
sn52.9:4.2: Atha kho āyasmā sāriputto sāyanhasamayaṃ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito … pe …
sn52.9:4.3: ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā sāriputto āyasmantaṃ anuruddhaṃ etadavoca:
sn52.9:5.1: “Vippasannāni kho te, āvuso anuruddha, indriyāni, parisuddho mukhavaṇṇo pariyodāto.
sn52.9:5.2: Katamenāyasmā anuruddho vihārena etarahi bahulaṃ viharatī”ti?
sn52.9:5.3: “Catūsu khvāhaṃ, āvuso, satipaṭṭhānesu suppatiṭṭhitacitto etarahi bahulaṃ viharāmi.
sn52.9:5.5: Idhāhaṃ, āvuso, kāye kāyānupassī viharāmi ātāpī sampajāno satimā, vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ;
sn52.9:5.8: dhammesu dhammānupassī viharāmi ātāpī sampajāno satimā, vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ—
sn52.9:5.9: imesu khvāhaṃ, āvuso, catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu suppatiṭṭhitacitto etarahi bahulaṃ viharāmi.
sn52.9:5.10: Yo so, āvuso, bhikkhu arahaṃ khīṇāsavo vusitavā katakaraṇīyo ohitabhāro anuppattasadattho parikkhīṇabhavasaṃyojano sammadaññāvimutto, so imesu catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu suppatiṭṭhitacitto bahulaṃ viharatī”ti.
sn52.9:6.1: “Lābhā vata no, āvuso, suladdhaṃ vata no, āvuso.
sn52.9:6.2: Ye mayaṃ āyasmato anuruddhassa sammukhāva assumha āsabhiṃ vācaṃ bhāsamānassā”ti.
